title: Where Do We Go from Here? | Guests: John Ziegler & Steve Deace | 12/15/20
description:
Attorney General Bill Barr is resigning after failing to release the reports he promised. Wisconsin and Georgia express massive election concerns … conveniently, after the Electoral College voted for Joe Biden. A new report doesn’t look good for Dominion voting machines. The New York Times credited the government for the coronavirus vaccine’s quick release. Who will Trump pardon next? Mediaite’s John Ziegler asks the 10 most important COVID-related questions the media is ignoring. Mitch McConnell officially recognizes Joe Biden as president-elect, so where do we go from here? BlazeTV’s Steve Deace shares his thoughts and discusses his new book, “A Nefarious Carol." Glenn hears from listeners about what they feel the Right should do.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
